plot: Clara, a young girl with the ability to heal insomniacs is being exploited by her aunt, Marta. When Omar, a new neighbor befriends Clara, they spawn a friendship that causes events beyond their control to set in motion.
title: Dream Healing
plot_es: Clara, a young girl with the ability to heal insomniacs is being exploited by her aunt, Marta. When Omar, a new neighbor befriends Clara, they spawn a friendship that causes events beyond their control to set in motion.
plot_en: Clara, a young girl with the ability to heal insomniacs is being exploited by her aunt, Marta. When Omar, a new neighbor befriends Clara, they spawn a friendship that causes events beyond their control to set in motion.
